## 1. Load the datasets

library(dplyr)
library(Seurat)
library(patchwork)
library(tidyverse)
library(sleepwalk)
library(gridExtra)
library(future)
library(RColorBrewer)

setwd("")

# Load the datasets
data = Read10X(data.dir = "")
 = CreateSeuratObject(counts = N1_data, project = "N1")
N1$Sample = "N1"
N1$Treatment = "Non_Responder"
